metaData.label: WH
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal OBG OR mainSpecialty equal GYN

metaData.label: DIAB
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal END OR mainSpecialty equal DIA

metaData.label: SURG
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal GS OR mainSpecialty equal RHU OR mainSpecialty equal T OR mainSpecialty equal IM OR mainSpecialty equal NS OR mainSpecialty equal FMG OR mainSpecialty equal N

metaData.label: KIDS
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal PD OR mainSpecialty equal PNR OR mainSpecialty equal PDN OR mainSpecialty equal PDS OR mainSpecialty equal CCP OR mainSpecialty equal PDE OR mainSpecialty equal CPP OR mainSpecialty equal PDD OR mainSpecialty equal PON OR mainSpecialty equal PPR OR mainSpecialty equal NPM

metaData.label: LOR
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal OTO OR mainSpecialty equal PDO OR mainSpecialty equal PLMN OR mainSpecialty equal AI OR mainSpecialty equal PDA OR mainSpecialty equal AU

metaData.label: Gastro
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal DUS OR mainSpecialty equal DEN OR mainSpecialty equal NEP OR mainSpecialty equal PG OR mainSpecialty equal DT OR mainSpecialty equal D

metaData.label: Ecxl
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal GE OR mainSpecialty equal HEP OR mainSpecialty equal ID

triggeredSend.preHeader: Ассоциация Е.В.А. при поддержке MSD запускает проект, направленный на поддержку женщин-матерей, живущих с ВИЧ в России.
